channel.title: Empire Earth : Gold Edition for free!
channel.description:
http://www.gog.com/en/gamecard/empire_earth_gold_edition
For those of you who have played AoE-series, you already know this game. If you don't, shame on you!
It's free for the next 48 hours (you register, push download, and it becomes "purchased" which means you can download it at any time in the future).
It's actually quite fun in multiplayer, and works much like AoE except you from the prehistoric era to the future.

item.title: Empire Earth : Gold Edition for free!

I’ll try it in Wine in a bit, would be nice if it worked on my Fedora box.

item.title: Empire Earth : Gold Edition for free!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

GOG.com

Empire Earth Gold Edition

Control the destiny of a fledgling civilization through as many as 500,000 years of human history. From meagre beginnings you must exploit the natural resources around you to build an empire capable of dominating the Earth. But your rise to supremacy...

For those of you who have played AoE-series, you already know this game. If you don’t, shame on you!

It’s free for the next 48 hours (you register, push download, and it becomes “purchased” which means you can download it at any time in the future).

It’s actually quite fun in multiplayer, and works much like AoE except you from the prehistoric era to the future.

Read full topic
